sqlMap.select: select a.CW_DJXH as cwDjxh,a.SS_JGBM as ssJgbm,a.FYLB_MC as fylbMc,a.YXBZ as yxbz,a.CJR_CZY_DJXH as cjrCzyDjxh, (SELECT RY.MC from QY_RYDJ RY WHERE RY.CZY_DJXH=a.CJR_CZY_DJXH) cjrMc, (SELECT RY.MC from QY_RYDJ RY WHERE RY.CZY_DJXH=a.XGR_CZY_DJXH) xgrMc, a.CJRQ as cjrq,a.XGR_CZY_DJXH as xgrCzyDjxh,a.XGRQ as xgrq from CW_FYLB a where a.CW_DJXH=#cwDjxh#
sqlMap.insert:
select SEQ_CW_DJXH.nextval as cwDjxh from dual
insert into CW_FYLB(CW_DJXH,SS_JGBM,FYLB_MC,YXBZ,CJR_CZY_DJXH, CJRQ,XGR_CZY_DJXH,XGRQ) values(#cwDjxh:NUMERIC#,#ssJgbm:NUMERIC#,#fylbMc:VARCHAR#,#yxbz:VARCHAR#,#cjrCzyDjxh:NUMERIC#, to_date(#cjrq:DATE#,'yyyy-MM-dd'),#xgrCzyDjxh:NUMERIC#,to_date(#xgrq:DATE#,'yyyy-MM-dd'))
